CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto-fills with the Agency on the Advertiser Account when the Opportunity is created. If this value is incorrect, it can be updated. Be sure to update the Agency value on the Advertiser, too, so that any future Opportunities are created with the correct Agency value.
CustomField.label: Agency

lookupFilter.errorMessage: The Account entered must have the Record Type of Agency.
